author: Amazon Customer

review: It's got everything I need but it doesn't have the more, as an avid prime user, one of the things that I hate the most is its poor collection of animations. When you do find some there dubbed in English, and some of the English voice actors make it painful to hear. I need the "and more" part to let me have the crunchyroll and funimation app work on the Fire Stick. But it doesn't, which is a huge let down for me. Because really who has the time to connect their laptop to the computer every time they want to watch a new show. The good thing is it comes with YOUTUBE. Funimation has a YouTube channel so that's one way to get around it.I've yet to lose any connections to mine, let's hope it stays that way.Great images and it connects really fast to the WiFi.
author: laura vallejo
